wikipedia_page.main: Wilde Oscar (born 8 April 1967 in Burnham, Buckinghamshire, England) is an English retired pornographic film actor. He is noted for being married to, and frequently performing with, the English pornographic film actress, Nici Sterling.

response: * Wilde Oscar, The Happy Prince / Prințul fericit; The Devoted Friend / Prietenul cel bun, Bilingual collection Bufnița, Pitești, Editura Paralela 45, 2003 (reprinted in  2008, 2010, 2011, 2014);
* Best Supporting Actor—Video: Wilde Oscar, West Side
** Ben Dover, Nici Sterling, Wilde Oscar; Ben Dover's British Butt Search

link_mentions.page: AVN Award for Best Supporting Actor
response: First recipient of the award was Richard Pacheco, who was awarded at 1st AVN Awards in 1984 for his performance in Nothing to Hide. As of 2022, Randy Spears is the most honoured pornographic actor with seven awards followed by Xander Corvus with four awards, while three pornographic actorsSteven St. Croix, Tony Tedeschi and Tom Byron with three awards and ten pornographic actorsRichard Pacheco, Ron Jeremy, Jamie Gillis, Mike Horner, Jon Dough, Michael J. Cox, Wilde Oscar, Joey Silvera, Rick Savage and Tommy Pistolhave won the award two times. Xander Corvus is the youngest recipient of the award at the age of 23. The most recent recipient is Tommy Pistol, who was honoured at the 39th AVN Awards in 2022 for his performance in Casey: A True Story.
